Text.Value: Focus on your parasite and connect with the sovereign.
((*I am Sovereign. and you bring the Rot. duergar*))
*You see a vision: your lifeless body, wrapped in fungal tendrils. The sovereign is threatening you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player is hallucinating and trying to stay calm over the sight of his dead body
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player closes eyes as if seeing the vision in their head.
EditorData.StateChangeTags: Vision of player lifless and wrapped in fungal tendrils

Text.Value: ROAR.
As if you could even graze me. Stand down.
Mumble an ancient gith axiom in rhythm with the sovereign.
Hum a peaceful tune in harmony with the sovereign.
*Fungal roots weave through your mind, seeking your true intent.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player closes eyes takes a deep breath to vocus on seeing the vision
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player closes eyes as if to see the vision.

Text.Value: Kneel in submission. I mean no harm to you.
Kneel in submission. My duergar companion means you no harm.
*You see a vision: your lifeless body, wrapped in fungal tendrils. The sovereign is threatening you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player is hallucinating and trying to stay calm over the sight of his dead body
EditorData.StateChangeTags: Vision of player lifless and wrapped in fungal tendrils

Text.Value: ((*descend to me. let us speak in flesh*))

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Overhead view, as sovereign is not in sight range. (Custom cameras required)

Text.Value: ((*you are worthy. be among us*))
*You are swallowed by a chorus of frenzied music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of a myconid collective.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player reacting to the sound of the myconid singing. little overwelmed and courious to whats happening - Kilian

Text.Value: If I wanted you dead, you would be. Don't tempt me.
Seek understanding. Focus on the sovereign's song.
*The persistent music coaxes you forward. The sovereign expects you.*
Conjure tranquil memories in hopes of calming the sovereign.
((*Sovereign. he has come. the Rot has come*))
((*Sovereign. she has come. the Rot has come*))
((*Sovereign. they have come. the Rot has come*))
((*hush. the Sovereign awaits*))
*Fungal roots weave through your mind, poking you, warning you...*
((*state your purpose*))
*The fright-choir fades. A single melody rises above the others, brassy and commanding.*

EditorData.MusicTags: the fright - choir faded. Asingle melody rose above the others, brassy and commanding

Text.Value: I am nature's bulwark. Where good things grow, I lend my protection.
To do what is right. To do my duty.
I seek retribution for those who cannot.
I have no 'purpose'. I simply am. That is enough.
I am a traveller seeking adventure.
*The parasite is quiet. You feel no bond with the creature.*
((*I am Sovereign. and you are duergar. you are Rot*))
Never you mind. Stand down, or be knocked down.
I sense your fear. I've come to aid you.
Counter with your own memory. Duergar builders, not burners. Not rot.
My purpose is private. Let me pass, and I will leave you unharmed.
*You are swallowed by a chorus of turbulent music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of a myconid collective.*
*You are swallowed by a chorus of turbulent music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of an entire collective.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player reacting to the sound of the myconid singing. little overwelmed and courious to whats happening - Kilian

Text.Value: Let me pass. I've come for the runaway gnome.
((*Sovereign. he has come. he is here*))
((*Sovereign. she has come. she is here*))
((*Sovereign. they have come. they are here*))
((*I can mend neither skin nor spirit. but we still might commune*))
*The choir fades. A single melody rises above the others, brassy and commanding.*

EditorData.MusicTags: The choir faced. A single melody rose above the others, brassy and commanding

Text.Value: *You discern no information or intention in the sovereign's song.*
((*vile beast*))
((*the Sovereign spoke its word. you will obey*))
*...strangling you.*
((*I am Sovereign*))
*You detect a distinct quiver in every note. These creatures have experienced recent tragedy.*
You dare call me rot? I'll kill you.
These tricks of the mind don't frighten me - I'll kill you!
((*cure the Rot. end it*))
The Underdark is my home - I don't need your permission to pass.
*Then the sovereign drones a new melody, cautious but welcoming.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Overhead view, as sovereign is not in sight range.

Synopsis: You come upon the myconid guards. They warn the sovereign of your presence teleapthically, and it begins to speak to you. This should be creepy, hallucinatory.
